segments.text: Can I take your order now or do you still want to look at the menu ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I want a fillet steak , medium , but my little girl doesn't care for steak . Could she have something else instead ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly . How about spaghetti with clams and shrimps .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds delicious . OK . She'll try that .
segments.speaker: S2
